analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/3/0xb110ec7b1dcb8fab8dedbf28f53bc63ea5bedd84.sol#113-114) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/3/0xb110ec7b1dcb8fab8dedbf28f53bc63ea5bedd84.sol#211-248)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/3/0xb110ec7b1dcb8fab8dedbf28f53bc63ea5bedd84.sol#329-351)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0xb110ec7b1dcb8fab8dedbf28f53bc63ea5bedd84.sol#422-436)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0xb110ec7b1dcb8fab8dedbf28f53bc63ea5bedd84.sol#440-458)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/3/0xb110ec7b1dcb8fab8dedbf28f53bc63ea5bedd84.sol#522-526) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/3/0xb110ec7b1dcb8fab8dedbf28f53bc63ea5bedd84.sol#261-280):
	External calls:
	- ! TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount) (/unique_chucks/3/0xb110ec7b1dcb8fab8dedbf28f53bc63ea5bedd84.sol#277-278)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/3/0xb110ec7b1dcb8fab8dedbf28f53bc63ea5bedd84.sol#279)

Reentrancy in XID.multiMint (/unique_chucks/3/0xb110ec7b1dcb8fab8dedbf28f53bc63ea5bedd84.sol):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(generateTokens(addr,amount)) (/unique_chucks/3/0xb110ec7b1dcb8fab8dedbf28f53bc63ea5bedd84.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- paid (/unique_chucks/3/0xb110ec7b1dcb8fab8dedbf28f53bc63ea5bedd84.sol)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/3/0xb110ec7b1dcb8fab8dedbf28f53bc63ea5bedd84.sol#489) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/3/0xb110ec7b1dcb8fab8dedbf28f53bc63ea5bedd84.sol#528-537)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/3/0xb110ec7b1dcb8fab8dedbf28f53bc63ea5bedd84.sol#522-526)
	- /unique_chucks/3/0xb110ec7b1dcb8fab8dedbf28f53bc63ea5bedd84.sol#524-526
